sentences.en: A Bedouin tribal elder tends camels at nightfall in Sahamah, Oman.
sentences.cn: 黄昏的阿曼,萨哈马,一位贝多因部落的老人正驱赶一只骆驼.

sentences.en: A national Athenian spirit at last began to overtake tribal loyalties.
sentences.cn: 雅典的民族精神,也最终超越了忠于部落的境界.

sentences.en: A TRIBAL COUNCIL FOR THE COMMON AFFAIRS OF THE TRIBE.
sentences.cn: 有讨论公共事务的部落议事会.

sentences.en: Conversely, general acceptance can sometimes span national and tribal borders.
sentences.cn: 反之, 有时能够跨越民族和部落的界限而被普遍接受.

sentences.en: Gifts Articles Beaded Neck, Wrist Ornamentation , Antique , Tribal, Stone Components.
sentences.cn: 采购产品礼品, 项链,手链, 古董, 石头装饰.

sentences.en: He became skilled in several tribal lingoes.
sentences.cn: 他精通几种部族的语言.

sentences.en: Human beings are all gregarious , both tribal and racial.
sentences.cn: 在部落和种族之间人类生命都是群居的.

sentences.en: It might be the sculpture of a certain tribal leader.
sentences.cn: 它可能是某个部落首领的头像.

sentences.en: Snakeskin pattern against tribal brown a wild and exotic feel.
sentences.cn: 蛇皮模式对部落褐色的野生和异国情调的感觉.

sentences.en: The early books of The Old Testament reflect the memory of tribal groups in Palestine.
sentences.cn: 《旧约全书》的早期版本记载了这些部落群体在巴勒斯坦定居的情况.

sentences.en: The four provinces are riven by deep family and tribal conflicts.
sentences.cn: 这4个省被严重的家族和部族纷争弄得四分五裂。

sentences.en: The linguists went to study tribal languages in the field.
sentences.cn: 语言学家们去实地研究部落语言了.

sentences.en: The tribal dance was a spectacle of barbaric splendour.
sentences.cn: 部落舞展示了一场五颜六色的半开化先民的奇观.

sentences.en: They would go back to their tribal lands.
sentences.cn: 他们会回到自己部族的地盘上。

sentences.en: Tribal lore and custom have been passed down orally.
sentences.cn: 部落的知识和风俗口耳相传保存下来.

words.tran_cn: 部落文化；部落制；部落制度

trans.tran_en: relating to a tribe or tribes
